page.title: 08CRUDWELL VILLAGE SHOPS
page.content:
{The Corner Stores}is a small shop owned by{Mr and Mrs Payne.}It was built in 1915.Mr and Mrs Payne get up at 5 o'clock every morning except Sundays to sort out and deliver the {newspapers.}They have four helpers.They sell a wide variety of goods including sweets,fresh fruit and vegetables, frozen foods,bread, groceries and hot pies.
{The Post Office}has been run by{Mr and {Mrs Start}for the past six years. Inside the shop is a{post office {counter}and a general stores.They sell all sorts of things including toys, seeds,cards and groceries.The post box is in the wall outside.The mail is collected twice daily.You can find out about local events by reading the posters and notice boards in the shop.
